source.44a6940d:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
source.a8ecc94f:
janjun15_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-janjune-15.csv")
apr14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-apr14.csv")
may14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-may14.csv")
jun14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-jun14.csv")
jul14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-jul14.csv")
aug14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-aug14.csv")
sep14_data = pd.read_csv("../input/uber-pickups-in-new-york-city/uber-raw-data-sep14.csv")
source.73041473:
janjun15_data["Pickup_date"] = pd.to_datetime(janjun15_data["Pickup_date"], format="%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S")
janjun15_data["Month"] = janjun15_data["Pickup_date"].dt.month
janjun15_data["Weekday"] = janjun15_data["Pickup_date"].dt.day_name()
janjun15_data["Day"] = janjun15_data["Pickup_date"].dt.day
janjun15_data["Hour"] = janjun15_data["Pickup_date"].dt.hour
janjun15_data["Minute"] = janjun15_data["Pickup_date"].dt.minute
source.67642fe7:
plt.figure(figsize = (10,5))
janjun15_data["Month"].value_counts().sort_index().plot(kind = "bar", color = "lightcoral")
plt.xlabel("Month")
plt.ylabel("No. of Uber Rides")
plt.xticks(rotation = 0)
plt.title("Uber Rides by Month (Jan-Jun15)")
source.a5ade134:
plt.figure(figsize = (10,5))
janjun15_data["Hour"].value_counts().sort_index().plot(kind = "bar", color = "mediumseagreen")
plt.xlabel("Hour in a day")
plt.ylabel("No. of Uber Rides")
plt.xticks(rotation = 0)
plt.title("Uber Rides by Hour (Jan-Jun15)")
source.c487120d:
plt.figure(figsize = (10,5))
janjun15_data["Weekday"].value_counts().sort_index().plot(kind = "bar", color = "slateblue")
plt.xlabel("Weekday")
plt.ylabel("No. of Uber Rides")
plt.xticks(rotation = 0)
plt.title("Uber Rides by Weekday (Jan-Jun15)")
source.6985c9a6:
ax = sns.countplot(x = "Weekday", data = janjun15_data, color = "slateblue")
ax.set_ylabel("No. of Uber Rides")
ax.set_title("No. of Uber Rides by Weekday")
source.902f3633:
**Note:** The Base codes are for the following Uber bases: B02512 : Unter
B02598 : Hinter
B02617 : Weiter
B02682 : Schmecken
B02764 : Danach-NY
